review: I like the clarity of the movies also setup was easy I am sixty three and it was a breeze. I had a little problem opening battery case to remote.
author: rena

review: This is a great way -- to view AMAZON TELEVISION!!!!!!It won't play Netflix, and hundreds of other customers are having the EXACT same problem as me: a message, no matter what show/movie you pick, saying "We're having trouble delivering this title at this time, please try again later." I updated the app, rebooted the stick, did all the little fixes, and IT STILL DOESN'T PLAY NETFLIX! AMAZON, I'M STARTING TO SMELL A RAT!From a longtime Prime customer.
author: C. Carr "the baron"
